title: Online Maintenance Requests, New Kitchen Appliance Package
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1083 Sq.
The community has implemented social distancing practices due to COVID-19.
Meet us virtually or by appointment for a socially distanced outside meeting!
Hardwood-style Flooring, Private Balconies, Modern Styles, New Kitchen Appliance Package

New Online Services, Sundeck, Cyber Cafe, Online Maintenance Requests, Newly Renovated Homes, Play Park, Resort-Style Swimming Pool, Clothes Care Center, Leash-Free Dog Park, Convenient Online Payments, Fitness Studio, New Pool Lounge Area (Coming Soon)
Other Pets Allowed: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $300 pet fee (non-refundable) per pet.
Pet rent is $20 per month, per pet.
There is a weight limit of 50 pounds per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.
Please call our leasing office for our pet policy.
